title: How to Shoot a Rubber Band With One Hand

steps.title: Hold the rubber band with your little (or fourth) finger (tight.
steps.content: Hold the rubber band with your little (or fourth) finger (tight. )

steps.title: Wrap the rubber band around the base of your thumb.
steps.content: Wrap the rubber band around the base of your thumb.

steps.title: Point your index finger and latch the rubber band to the tip of it.
steps.content: Point your index finger and latch the rubber band to the tip of it.

steps.title: Make the shape of a gun with your hand.
steps.content: Make the shape of a gun with your hand.

steps.title: Loosen up the friction between the rubber band and your little finger, the rubber band should then shoot.
steps.content: Loosen up the friction between the rubber band and your little finger, the rubber band should then shoot.
